!+enter --> this is for emmet abbreviation ctrl+/ --> Comment strong --> Bold em --> italic Alt+W --> log wrap br --> line break (no need to close) hr --> horizontl line (no need to close) ctrl+ entr --> new line a href --> to add a weblink img --> insert image ul --> underorder list ol --> order list shift+end --> copy statement meta tag doesn't have closing tag copy same line --> shift+alt+up/down
